id.description: The unique identifier of the address record

customer_id.description: The unique identifier of the customer associated with the address

address_line_1.description: The address line 1 of the customer

address_type.description: The type of address, e.g., residential or commercial

address_line_2.description: The address line 2 of the customer, if applicable

city.description: The city where the address is located

state.description: The state or region where the address is located

postal_code.description: The postal or ZIP code of the address

country.description: The country where the address is located

is_default_shipping_address.description: Indicates if this is the default shipping address for the customer

phone.description: The primary phone number associated with the address

company.description: The name of the company associated with the address

alternate_phone.description: An alternate phone number associated with the address

fax.description: The fax number associated with the address

comments.description: Any additional comments or notes related to the address

is_default_billing_address.description: Indicates if this is the default billing address for the customer

created_at.description: The date and time when the address was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the address was last updated

first_name.description: The first name of the customer

last_name.description: The last name of the customer
